subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton scored 25 points and the rookie D. J. Augustin added 11 of his 20 points in overtime to help the Charlotte Bobcats stun the Boston Celtics, 114-106, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Raymond Felton scored 25 points and the rookie D. J. Augustin added 11 of his 20 points in overtime to help the Charlotte Bobcats stun the Boston Celtics, 114-106, on Tuesday night.
